item.title: How to Steal Expensive Fonts
item.description: Every once in a while you need to see a font in action before you purchase it. And a lot of sites currently allow you this ability to preview them live. This is a great feature, not because it allows you to preview the text on the fly, but because the font is actually available for you to download. Let’s Begin This is not at all a complicated process, and for our purposes we are going to be using the following
